DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test feasibility safety use new device call Yukio 's Uterine Manipulating Instrument ( YUMI ) . The YUMI type uterine manipulator . It reusable metal device design simple study . It also adjustable size make easy surgeon use . It place begin surgery remove end . This study allow researcher find surgeon find YUMI effective easy use . It also allow researcher see device safe . This first time YUMI use human .
DOC.criteria: Participant must schedule total laparoscopic roboticassisted hysterectomy gynecologic condition Participants must 18 year age old Participant eligible surgeon plan use uterine manipulator
